title: Finite- and Large-Sample Inference for Ranks using Multinomial Data with an Application to Ranking Political Parties
abstract: It is common to rank different categories by means of preferences that are revealed through data on choices. A prominent example is the ranking of political candidates or parties using the estimated share of support each one receives in surveys or polls about political attitudes. Since these rankings are computed using estimates of the share of support rather than the true share of support, there may be considerable uncertainty concerning the true ranking of the political candidates or parties. In this paper, we consider the problem of accounting for such uncertainty by constructing confidence sets for the rank of each category. We consider both the problem of constructing marginal confidence sets for the rank of a particular category as well as simultaneous confidence sets for the ranks of all categories. translated_title: 用多项式数据对排名进行有限样本和大样本推断，以政党排名应用为例
translated_abstract: 通过揭示数据选择的偏好来对不同类别进行排名是常见的做法。一个著名的例子是使用调查或有关政治态度的民意调查中每个政治候选人或政党获得的估计支持份额来对其进行排名。由于这些排名是使用支持份额的估计而不是真实支持份额计算的，所以对于政治候选人或政党的真实排名可能存在相当大的不确定性。在本文中，我们考虑通过构建每个类别排名的置信区间来解决这种不确定性的问题。我们既考虑了对特定类别排名构建边际置信区间的问题，也考虑了对所有类别排名构建同时置信区间的问题。我们分析的一个特点是利用数据的多项式结构来开发在有限样本中有效的置信区间。
tldr: 本研究提出了一种利用多项式数据结构进行有限样本推断排名的方法，在政党排名应用中进行了验证。
